attributes.action: A general election must be debated, called and underway this week
attributes.additional_details:
In order to prevent economic driven unrest, and to provide a clear path for our nation backed by policy less easily undermined, and, more importantly, believed in by an elected official.

It's high time that we engaged the British public in this process again as by not doing so we're alienating the very people that government claim to serve.
attributes.background: The government has caused us to plummet down the G20 rankings and forced us into economic turmoil. If we await another budget before a general election we'll cause more market uncertainty. We're fixing the symptoms not the cause by delaying a general election. We must act now.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
